item.title: Using Ctrl + Arrow Keys in vim inside tmux
item.description: Being a non-expert vim user, I like to use the Ctrl + Arrow Keys to navigate over words. However, this seems to break when using vim inside tmux. The simplest fix I could find is to add the following lines to .tmux.conf: set-option -g default-terminal "xterm-256color" set-window-option -g xterm-keys on
